accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer and the steps leading to it.

reasoning_quality.description: The logical coherence and relevance of the reasoning trace.

comprehensiveness.description: The extent to which important steps and aspects are considered and addressed.

source_reliability.description: The credibility of sources used to identify information.

execution_efficiency.description: How efficiently the agents execute the task with minimal unnecessary steps.

communication_clarity.description: Clarity of the instructions and communications between agents.

timeliness.description: The speed of the process in producing a solution.

adaptability.description: The system's ability to handle unforeseen variables or issues.

resource_utilization.description: Effectiveness in utilizing given resources without waste.

user_experience.description: Ease of use and satisfaction from the user's perspective.
